body:
Hey guys, alot of you may have saw my rage video where i got toxic and called someone a cheater and a racist comment. After realising what i said i feel so bad about saying that so i bleeped it out and also i showed my phone aftermath.

Check out what happened to my phone here!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_KIz5mY2y3A
